Key Match Events: Anastasios Bakasetas and Petros Mantalos scored for Greece
The Republic of Ireland squandered a golden opportunity in the early stages
Miscellaneous Highlights: Greece maintained their 100% record in the UEFA Nations League
The Republic of Ireland stay in third place - a relegation qualification spot
Others: Ivan Jovanovic's side remained above England in Group B2
Liverpool goalkeeper Caoimhin Kelleher made a big error while trying to pass out from the back in the dying moments of the game
